xxl.core.indexStructures
Class MTree

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree
          xxl.core.indexStructures.MTree
Direct Known Subclasses:
SlimTree
public class MTree
extends ORTree

An ORTree for objects with spheres as regions. For a detailed discussion see P. Ciaccia, M. Patella, P. Zezula: "M-tree: An Efficient Access Method for Similarity Search in Metric Spaces", VLDB (1997) 426-435.

See Also:
Tree, ORTree, SlimTree

Nested Class Summary
 class MTree.LeafEntry
          LeafEntry is the class used to represent entries of leafnodes of MTree.
 class MTree.LeafEntryConverter
          This class acts as a converter to serialize the tree's leaf-entries.
 class MTree.Node
          Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of MTree.
 class MTree.NodeConverter
          This class acts as a converter to serialize the tree's nodes.

Method Detail

getDistanceBasedComparator

protected Comparator getDistanceBasedComparator(Sphere referenceSphere)
Returns a comparator comparing spheres with respect to their distance to the given referenceSphere.

Parameters:
referenceSphere - the rererence for the comparison of the comparator
Returns:
a comparator returning 1, 0 or -1 if its first parameter has smaller, equal or greater distance to referenceSphere than the second one

computeDescriptor

public Descriptor computeDescriptor(Collection collection)
Description copied from class: ORTree
Computes the union of the descriptors of the collection's entries. The method ORTree.descriptor(Object) is used to determine the descriptors of these entries.

Overrides:
computeDescriptor in class ORTree
Parameters:
collection - a collection of objects
Returns:
the union of the descriptors of the collection's entries
See Also:
ORTree.descriptor(Object)

createNode

public Tree.Node createNode(int level)
Description copied from class: ORTree
Creates a new Node which does not have any information except its level.

Specified by:
createNode in class ORTree
Parameters:
level - the level of this node (i.e. the maximum distance to the leaves of the subtree)
Returns:
a new Node
See Also:
ORTree.Node

descriptor

public Descriptor descriptor(Object entry)
Description copied from class: ORTree
Returns the descriptor of a given entry. If this entry is an index entry its descriptor is returned, else the method Tree.descriptor(Object) is used to determine the descriptor of the entry.

Overrides:
descriptor in class ORTree
Parameters:
entry - the entry whose descriptor is to be determined
Returns:
the descriptor of the entry
See Also:
Tree.descriptor(Object)

sphere

public Sphere sphere(Object entry)
Returns the descriptor of entry as a sphere.

Parameters:
entry - the entry whos descriptor sphere is demanded.
Returns:
the sphere which is the descriptor of entry

query

public Cursor query(Descriptor queryDescriptor,
                    int targetLevel)
Description copied from class: ORTree
This method is an implemtation of an efficient querying algorithm. The result is a lazy Cursor pointing to all objects whose descriptors overlap with the given queryDescriptor.

Overrides:
query in class ORTree
Parameters:
queryDescriptor - describes the query in terms of a descriptor
targetLevel - the tree-level to provide the answer-objects
Returns:
a lazy cursor pointing to all response objects

leafEntryConverter

public Converter leafEntryConverter(Converter objectConverter)
Creates a new Converter for leaf-entries using the given Converter for objects stored within the entries.

Parameters:
objectConverter - a Converter to serialize objects stored in the leaf-entries
Returns:
a new Converter for leaf-entries

                               Converter indexEntryConverter)
Description copied from class: ORTree
Gets a suitable Converter to serialize the tree's nodes.

Overrides:
nodeConverter in class ORTree

indexEntryConverter - a converter to convert the index entries

a NodeConverter
